subject: Missing part from my order
description_text:
Hi,

Thank you very much for the assistance.

I received the pedals today, they look amazing.

However, the haptics reactor motors came with 2 brackets instead of 3. It
looks like it's missing the "U-shaped Adapter Plate - large (Brake)"

Please see the attached picture

conversations.body_text: Hi Gonzalo Otano,     We sincerely apologize for the delay. Your order has now been shipped, but the shipping costs were exceptionally high, totaling approximately $153 USD. Due to the delay caused to you, we will absorb the loss on this shipment. Typically, we would charge an additional fee for such excess shipping costs. Thank you for your understanding.

Hi!

Thank you very much for the update and all the assistance you have
provided. Despite the inconveniences I appreciate the effort and work you
put to try to find a solution and your service was excellent.
As I mentioned in one of my communications, when I did the checkout, all
the address details were correct and Qatar was an option, and I was charged
a fee for shipping based on the entered delivery address. I actually bought
from your site directly instead of other resellers exactly because of this,
as your shipping cost was cheaper.
Again, not to blame, this things happen, but just for your information
maybe to revise this on your website to avoid similar issues with other
customers in the future.

Nevertheless, as I said, thank you for the service you have provided. I
hope the pedals experience match your customer service experience. I am
sure it will!

Best regards
Gonzalo

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025, 7:03 AM service@simsonn.com

Hey guys,

Sorry to bother you again,

Which is the courier company used? I am not able to track the package
directly from the link or from your website...

Hi Gonzalo Otano,     The product has arrived at the warehouse but has not yet been received and dispatched. We have already followed up on this matter. The international logistics provider should be either FedEx or DHL.

Hi,

Thank you very much for the assistance.

I received the pedals today, they look amazing.

However, the haptics reactor motors came with 2 brackets instead of 3. It
looks like it's missing the "U-shaped Adapter Plate - large (Brake)"

Please see the attached picture

      主题: #SSN4182 Order Status

 Hi,   
 I would like to know the status of my order #SSN4182. I placed the order more than a week ago and I haven't received any update or estimated delivery date.

Hi Gonzalo Otano,  We will promptly send you three U-shaped brackets for the pedals. Please provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address.
